content: I'm not trained as a KC, but I was helping out with a reshifting list, which after it finished pointed me at: "H4H Recruitment_101224_ Type: Recruitment". I'm delighted to work on that, but I'm not sure I've been approriately trained to answer possible questions from hosts. Where should I ask about this?
Hi Jesse- have you participated in phone banks? The biggest things people need to know are that we have a whole crew to support them and they can reach out to us via email or Discord.
If you have qs you can ping us here. Lots of the red moderators are also supporting the independent phone banks and can help you out
